title: The All ASUS PC - ASUS 2023 TUF Lineup
description: Thanks ASUS for sponsoring todays video! Get TufGame TUF with the ASUS TUF Global Giveaway and exclusive TUF Gaming deals! Shop the latest TUF deals at   Enter the ASUS TUF Gaming global giveaway on Gleam between March 16-April 17 for a chance to win a TUF Gaming GeForce RTX 4070TI and more! Enter here:   Buy an ASUS TUF Gaming Z790-Plus WiFi Motherboard:  Buy an ASUS TUF Gaming NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070 Ti GPU:  Buy an ASUS TUF Gaming GT502 ATX Mid-Tower Case:  Buy an ASUS TUF Gaming TF120 ARGB Chassis Fan:  Buy an ASUS TUF Gaming LC 240 ARGB AIO Liquid CPU Cooler:  Buy an ASUS TUF Gaming 28 4K 144HZ Gaming Monitor:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at    GET MERCH:   LTX 2023 TICKETS AVAILABLE NOW:   GET EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ON FLOATPLANE:   SPONSORS, AFFILIATES, AND PARTNERS:   PRODUCTS WE USE ON THE SHORTCIRCUIT SET:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 R U TUF ENOUGH? 0:23 Motherboard 3:13 CPU 4:33 GPU 5:52 Case 9:54 Monitor 10:27 Gaming + Performance
